alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 1:51PM EDT until July 07 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CALEDONIA AND SOUTHWESTERN ESSEX COUNTIES... At 149 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over St. Johnsbury Center, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Fire department reported quarter size hail and multiple call outs for trees and wires down near Danville, Vermont at 1:30 PM. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... St. Johnsbury, Lyndon, Waterford, Gilman, Granby, Kirby, Victory, Concord, Lunenburg, Danville, Lower Waterford, Lyndonville Village, Barnet, Guildhall, Walden, Peacham, St. Johnsbury Center, Concord Corner, West Waterford, and Gallup Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
